title: In my Google Type C Earbud Google assistant control has stop working on my pixel 3 xl. Any solution.
content: I am using my Pixel type c earbud. It was working perfectly fine. But from last few days issue arise in it. It only play audio i mean we can hear properly from Youtube, Spotify. Mean it is working as a simple earphone. And all the other features stop working like Reading out notification, Google assistant and other thing we were easily able to do with out headset. How to fix it? Any solution for the same will be highly appreciated.
